controller

Class FileController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.FileController

  • public class FileController
extends java.lang.Object
    Main Controller for the PaparazziView.fxml view. Controller is implemented in a Singleton pattern.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void exportResultsToFile(java.lang.String[] results)
      Export results to file on file system under /results/results.txt.
      void exportViewToFile(javafx.scene.layout.BorderPane borderPane, MapDataSets dataSet, int testNumber, SearchAlgorithms searchAlgorithm)
      Export view to file on file system under /results/{DataSet}/ as *.png file.
      static FileController getInstance()
      Initialize and returns FileController instance.
      void initResultFolderStructure()
      Initialize result folder structure on file system.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static FileController getInstance()
        Initialize and returns FileController instance.
        Returns:
        the file controller singleton instance
        See Also:
        FileController

      • initResultFolderStructure

        public void initResultFolderStructure()
        Initialize result folder structure on file system. If an old results has been found, it the folder gets deleted first. For every DataSet a new sub-folder is created under "results".

      • exportViewToFile

        public void exportViewToFile(javafx.scene.layout.BorderPane borderPane,
                             MapDataSets dataSet,
                             int testNumber,
                             SearchAlgorithms searchAlgorithm)
        Export view to file on file system under /results/{DataSet}/ as *.png file.
        Parameters:
        borderPane - the view that should be saved
        dataSet - the data set to save file in correct result folder
        testNumber - the test number to identify test run
        searchAlgorithm - the search algorithm enum

      • exportResultsToFile

        public void exportResultsToFile(java.lang.String[] results)
        Export results to file on file system under /results/results.txt. Prints details about every tested algorithm.
        Parameters:
        results - the string array that should be printed to the file
